H0.text: what language does egyptian people speak. Egyptian Arabic

H1.text: what language does egyptian people speak. Coptic

H2.text: what language does egyptian people speak. Nubian

H3.text: what language does egyptian people speak. Modern Standard Arabic

A4.text: Egyptian Arabic, locally known as Colloquial Egyptian, or simply as Masri, is the most widely spoken vernacular Arabic variety in Egypt.

A5.text: Egyptian Arabic is used in most social situations, with Modern Standard and Classical Arabic generally being used only in writing and in highly religious and/or formal situations.
